input.sentences: [female] went shopping for furniture for her new offuce
first she picked out a desk .
then she went through the wide selection of chairs | testing them out until she found one she liked .
she browsed the vertical filing cabinets .
she decided she only needed two smaller | regular filing cabinets .
output.sentences: This is where I went shopping for office furniture.
The store had a wide selection and I enjoyed testing everything out.
I spent some time looking at vertical filing cabinets.
In the end I decided on a regular filing cabinet.
